name: Humanity or Infected
description:
You've been bitten, what do you do now? Do you find a cure? or do you embrace the infection?

In Humanity or Infected, you get to decided if you want to run around finding a cure for yourself or run around and eat people. But watch out, other infected don't care what you do, you're still food to them. 

I created this game during the 2015 Global Game Jam. I am putting it up here with a couple of my other games to see from the community which game I should develop more.
